name: Again, Forever
description:
You find yourself in a town with only one house in it.

Your mission is to uncover the secrets of the story behind the game.

And nothing bad will happen... At all, trust me.

Version 1.1.0: Fixed some bugs, added music to menu, added some new items and prepares for 1.2.0.

The game was made from: Around 33 hours of work from me.

If i had more time i would have added music and polished it a lot more and added more content.

This is the first but not the last game jam I'm participating in :)
